name: moppu
description:
Lips Game Jam Autumn 2019 Entry

----------oOo----------

Help moppu collect flowers for his girlfriend mippu.

SPACE - Jump
RIGHT ARROW - Move Right
LEFT ARROW - Move Left

----------oOo----------

This is the first time ever I worked on a platformer game and the first time I used and learned Lisp. It's been quite an adventure, was exciting and educational. 

Follow me on twitter: @sgt3v
